Articles.Content:
Can somebody please tell me where to direct a complaint? (regarding forums).

Thank you.
The forms itself? Try the Forum forum.

To report a post click on the triangle-icon.

And you can contact the admins by the Contact Us link at the bottom of the page.
Warning: Make sure your complaint is fair and justified first.
I've posted on the Forums forum. It may or may not be fairly justifiable, but I at least have said my piece.
Is this about the thread that got lock for breaking the rules?

Is this about the thread that got lock for breaking the rules?

It is, basically a rant at the rules.

you basically whined because you didn't like the rules and then proceeded to tell the mods that new members need to be treated nicer? Thanks for the morning laugh!

in other news, welcome to the forums, hopefully now that you said your peace you can enjoy the wealth of information these forums provide!
In all honesty, I think the rules here are fine. Actually fairly more lenient then most places I visit that are actually moderated.

Ranz it seems to me that the rules are directed at preventing outbursts such as yours and Chris's sarcastic comments just now, but please if you want to discuss this discuss it in the forums forum, as I don't want to derail general discussion. Let's not discuss the forum rules here, I just didn't know where the forums forum was. Thank you.

Edited July 18, 2013 by Synapse

In all honesty, I think the rules here are fine. Actually fairly more lenient then most places I visit that are actually moderated.

Looking at you twcenter.com. I haven't seen blatant suppression of posters at all here. And the worst offense is deleting posts that disagree with your friends posts, almost to the point where it looks like he is talking to himself.

In all honesty, I think the rules here are fine. Actually fairly more lenient then most places I visit that are actually moderated.

This forum doesn't need much moderation because most of the users are pretty well behaved. The only exception is maybe mechjeb threads lol

This forum doesn't need much moderation because most of the users are pretty well behaved. The only exception is maybe mechjeb threads lol

**MechJeb, cheats, mods in general, multiplayer, the game's development process and the "oh so controversial" do not suggest list.
OP's question has been answered and this thread is derailing off-topic. Closed.
